version_description:
* Total War Battles: KINGDOM is now available on iPhones (iPhone 5 or higher)
* New beach Battle map
* Improved pickup animations
* More resources are awarded for Battle victories
* Improved post Battle panel
* The Advisor now explains features such as Tracking, Crafting, and Pledging
* The Ballista and Trebuchet are now noticeably stronger
* Various infantry units have been slightly rebalanced
* Units now regroup faster during Battle
* Upgrading a production building to tier 2 now requires at least 1 active tier 2 Castle
* The Quarry prospecting clear timer has been reduced from 8h to 1h
* The Quarry prospecting now takes existing stone deposits into consideration
* Various bug fixes and stability improvements

* Bring life to your realm – people, livestock, and exotic wildlife (such as ducks!)
* You can now enjoy the game in French, German or Spanish
* New rewards await faithful lords who return to their kingdom daily
* Further improvements to balancing and stability

* Bring life to your realm – people, livestock, and exotic wildlife (such as ducks!)
* You can now enjoy the game in French, German or Spanish
* New rewards await faithful lords who return to their kingdom daily
* Further improvements to balancing and stability

* Bring life to your realm – people, livestock, and exotic wildlife (such as ducks!)
* You can now enjoy the game in French, German or Spanish
* New rewards await faithful lords who return to their kingdom daily
* Further improvements to balancing and stability

* Viking Explorers have arrived – new game mode: Viking Outposts
* 5 new Viking units to add to your army
* Improved PvP matchmaking
* You can now reset a unit's skill and choose a different one
* Schools of fish spawn more reliably
* If your Realm is about to be flooded, the water source will be blocked to prevent a flood
* An entry to the Kingdom Archive is made every 30 instead of 60 days

* Viking Explorers have arrived – new game mode: Viking Outposts
* 5 new Viking units to add to your army
* Improved PvP matchmaking
* You can now reset a unit's skill and choose a different one
* Schools of fish spawn more reliably
* If your Realm is about to be flooded, the water source will be blocked to prevent a flood
* An entry to the Kingdom Archive is made every 30 instead of 60 days

* Viking Explorers have arrived – new game mode: Viking Outposts
* 5 new Viking units to add to your army
* Improved PvP matchmaking
* You can now reset a unit's skill and choose a different one
* Schools of fish spawn more reliably
* If your Realm is about to be flooded, the water source will be blocked to prevent a flood
* An entry to the Kingdom Archive is made every 30 instead of 60 days

* Players can now log in with a Facebook account
* Costs to speed up certain actions have been changed from Gold to Silver or Food
* Players can now choose where to prospect with the Quarry
* A new "Available for recruitment' list has been added to the Army Setup panel that shows all the available troops
* Added more info for units that are “detached” or “unsupported”
* There are 5 new Outpost islands to be discovered
* A “Shipment Requirement” panel is now shown in your Viking Outpost
* The button to unblock water sources after flooding is now easier to find
* Minor bug fixes and memory optimisation
